name: World War Balls
description:
World War Balls is a neo-futuristic game with World War 2 implementations. Evil balls will follow you. Upon contact, you will lose health. Blow the balls up to survive.

This is the first game I ever developed.

 Created by: NotVector, 7/19/2020

Controls

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Click

Use Item: Right Click

Important

Windows

You will see a security message saying that I am an unidentified developer. You will see somewhere that says "more info" or something similar. Click on that and you should be able to open the game.

Mac

You will see that Mac is saying I am an unidentified developer. To open the game, go to Finder, Downloads, then find the game. RIGHT CLICK the game, then click Open.
